mapper.insert: insert into review(email, productNumber, content, score, imgURL, keywordMain, keywordSub, likeNumber, nickName) values(#{email}, #{productNumber}, #{content}, #{score}, #{imgURL}, #{keywordMain}, #{keywordSub}, #{likeNumber}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: select * from (select * from review where email=#{email}) r where r.keywordMain=#{keywordMain};
